data.eml:eml: Occurrence in Japan of Frankliniella hemerocallis (Thysanoptera, Thripidae), with description of the larva and key to Frankliniella species from Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Masumoto, Masami, Okajima, Shuji (2013): Occurrence in Japan of Frankliniella hemerocallis (Thysanoptera, Thripidae), with description of the larva and key to Frankliniella species from Japan. Zootaxa 3718 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.1.4
